mapper.select: select m.*,mf.mf from ( select m.*,pm.pm from ( select m.* from (tpm_member)m where m.member_idx in (select member_idx pm from tpm_project_member where project_idx=#{project_idx} and member_idx !=#{member_idx}) or m.member_idx in (select myfriend_idx from tpm_myfriend where member_idx=#{member_idx}) )m left outer join ( select member_idx,(1)as pm from tpm_member where member_idx in (select member_idx from tpm_project_member where project_idx=#{project_idx} and member_idx != #{member_idx}) )pm on m.member_idx=pm.member_idx )m left outer join ( select myfriend_idx,(10)mf from tpm_myfriend where member_idx=#{member_idx} )mf on m.member_idx=mf.myfriend_idx
mapper.update: update tpm_project_member set project_idx=#{project_idx}, project_member_idx=#{project_member_idx}, project_level=#{project_level}
